casebody.data:
99-0312 (La. 4/1/99)

STATE ex rel. Meldon COLER v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 99-KH-0312. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Coler, Meldon; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Jefferson 24th Judicial District Court Div. “D” Number 90-1871; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-KH-350

Denied. See State ex rel. Bernard v. Cr.D.C., 94-2247, p. 1 (La.4/28/95), 653 So.2d 1174, 1175; State ex rel. Degreat v. State, 98-0690 (La.7/2/98), 724 So.2d 205.

KIMBALL, J. not on panel.
